channel.title: Java programmer for your Server? im free, basic/intermediate..Details inside
channel.description:
hosting/moderating/maintaining/ and programing all at once is too tedious I would like to join you.
[u][b]What i can bring to the table.[/b][/u] I have over 1 year java programming experience, 3 years in c++, can make complex programs just about anything java or c++ related i can do. I'm looking for a small rsps community to help with debugs or programming in general. I use all proper syntax and have a natural talent for fixing bugs. I can give 20+ hours a week. I'm willing to do things "your way" I dont mind this concept at all i actually work much better with instructions =)
[b][u]what i would like from you.[/b] Your server cannot be chaos! I'm doing this to learn and improve my skills, I'm willing to moderate and I'm very friendly. Id like to stick to the programming so i don't think ill be super active on your server, but when I am it would be great to have a decent community people. I enjoy helping and get along wonderfully with others, I know this is hard to ask for but id like to join a longer lasting community that i can work on projects of all sizes. a huge plus is other programmers.
most projects 'smaller' can be completed in under a week. medium projects are usually completed within 2-4 weeks depending on how complex. id like to avoid larger projects unless you have more than 1 programmer i can work with :cool:
Leave a post or email me at HandgunSally@yahoo.com
